text: Caledonian Road is a station on the Piccadilly Line of the London Underground, between King's Cross St. Pancras and Holloway Road, and in Travelcard Zone 2. It was opened on 15 December 1906 by the Great Northern, Piccadilly and Brompton Railway. == References == Category:Piccadilly line stations Category:Tube stations in the London Borough of Islington Category:Railway stations opened in 1906
title: Caledonian Road tube station
